:::Bluestreak/Andromeda:::

::Bluestreak walks Andromeda to her new quarters, while explaining to her the 
situation of the ark::
Bluestreak: And so, after various attacks from the Aliance, the Predacons, 
the Newcomers, some Vok soldiers, and Savage, the ark is in total disrepair.
Andromeda: God, all that work on fixing it only for it to be attacked again?
Bluestreak: Yup.  Not to mention that every pure blooded transformer would 
die if the ark is totally destroyed
::They arrive in her quarters::
Andromeda: It was really nice talking to you, im glad i made a friend.
::She kissed him on the cheek and walked into her quarters::
Bluestreak: F-friends?
::He smiled and touched his cheek.  Things were looking up...::
